reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 100, MATH 102, MATH 104, MATH 110, MATH 120, MATH 180, MATH 184.
This is a Wait List Section for LFS 252 Section 002. Students will be moved according to their priority on the waitlist if space becomes available. All queries should be directed to the Faculty of Land and Food Systems Student Services at students@landfood.ubc.ca.
courseName: Land, Food, and Community: Quantitative Data Analysis
description: Introduction to tools needed for data analysis of the economic, ecological, health, and scientific components of land and food systems.
